1.title: Extinction
1.plot: Team Scorpion must work with their old nemesis Mark Collins in order to prevent the extinction of mankind.

2.title: More Extinction
2.plot: The team continue to work with their nemesis to prevent an extinction level event. Cabe makes a last minute decision that may endanger his career.

3.title: Grow a Deer, A Female Deer
3.plot: The team tries to save an endangered, pregnant deer that was shot by poachers. Happy and Toby discuss the future of their family.

4.title: Nuke Kids on the Block
4.plot: During the decommissioning of an old nuclear missile, the team is exposed to toxic vapor. Paige doesn't want Happy to tag along with her and Walter.

5.title: Sci Hard
5.plot: Team Scorpion is taken hostage during a tech convention.

6.title: Queen Scary
6.plot: At Halloween, Team Scorpion takes on a case to prove the existence of ghosts on the Queen Mary but find an all-too-real disaster when they locate a "ghost ship" on a deadly collision course. Also, Walter considers taking note of Paige's interests to benefit their relationship.

7.title: Go with the Flo(rence)
7.plot: A device that can prevent a nuclear meltdown is lost in the LA sewers and it is up to team Scorpion to find it while dealing with a new tenant next door.

8.title: Faire Is Foul
8.plot: The team goes to a renaissance festival but the revelry is short-lived when a group tries to rob a police evidence locker. Paige tires of Walter pointing out the anachronisms at the festival.

9.title: It's Raining Men (of War)
9.plot: On Thanksgiving, Team Scorpion is tasked with destroying a floating island of plastic.

10.title: Crime Every Mountain
10.plot: Team Scorpion tries to help a father and daughter involved in a plane crash. The team tries to help Cabe prepare for his trial. Paige helps Walter deal with his feelings about Cabe's possible prison future.

11.title: Who Let the Dog Out ('Cause Now It's Stuck in a Cistern)
11.plot: It's time for Cabe's trial and the team are anxious to know the outcome. They channel their nervous energy into saving a dog stuck in a cistern.

12.title: A Christmas Car-Roll
12.plot: Walter passes out and his Christmas Eve dream is of a world where Team Scorpion has never existed.

13.title: The Bunker Games
13.plot: Team Scorpion is locked in a doomsday bunker with artificial intelligence bent on killing them.

14.title: Lighthouse of the Rising Sun
14.plot: A solar storm knocks out power in Los Angeles, and Team Scorpion must help a teen pilot and his girlfriend who are lost over the Pacific without navigation or radio contact. Also, during the crisis, Walter must look after a group of Ralph's classmates, and Cabe tries to tell Allie finally that he loves her.

15.title: Wave Goodbye
15.plot: Team Scorpion must keep a tsunami from destroying a vulnerable nuclear plant. Toby helps his ex-fiancée recover her stolen identity.

16.title: Nerd, Wind & Fire
16.plot: When a helicopter crashes on top of a skyscraper on Valentine's Day, Team Scorpion must set aside their romantic plans and put them on hold to help save a doctor and pilot trapped inside the crashed chopper. Meanwhile, Happy and Toby await the news of their fertility test results and Sylvester realizes that he may have feelings for Florence.

17.title: Dumbster Fire
17.plot: After team Scorpion's mental faculties are impaired during a job to prevent the creation of a black hole, Paige must simplify the science for them. Florence and Sylvester grows closer after she helps him with a special project.

18.title: Dork Day Afternoon
18.plot: Team Scorpion is taken hostage after they inadvertently disrupt a bank heist.

19.title: Gator Done
19.plot: The team heads to the bayou to track down an alligator and stop a mosquito-born outbreak. Paige teaches Walter the concept of a "white lie". Toby must save Cabe's life after he is shot with a tranquilizer by Walter. Sylvester and Ralph help Patty deal with the mean girls in her school.

20.title: Foul Balls
20.plot: The team must use their IQs to win a softball game when challenged by the director of homeland security to a game with all future contracts on the line.

21.title: Kenny and the Jet
21.plot: Team Scorpion must save an unconscious, hypothermic boy stuck in the wheel well of their airborne plane; Paige realizes something's up when Walter's white lie takes a toll on him.

22.title: A Lie in the Sand
22.plot: Team Scorpion heads to Northeast Africa where they must carefully navigate a minefield in order to save the lives of local villagers. Also, Paige and Walter's relationship takes a shocking turn, and Toby and Happy make an important decision.

1.title: Pilot
1.plot: Walter O'Brien and his team of super geniuses are assigned, by the government, to help land airplanes after the communication system shuts down.

2.title: Single Point of Failure
2.plot: The Scorpion team races to find who used a genetically targeted virus on four children, one of whom is the daughter of the governor. This case strikes close to home for Walter and Agent Gallo.

3.title: A Cyclone
3.plot: After Team Scorpion fails a military training mission, they are determined to prove their worth to Cabe and Homeland Security when a bomber threatens to take out the internet infrastructure of the entire Southwest.

4.title: Shorthanded
4.plot: When Team Scorpion goes to Las Vegas on a mission in a casino, Walter is framed for a robbery.

5.title: Plutonium Is Forever
5.plot: Walter and his team try to prevent a decommissioned nuclear plant from melting down, aided by a former member of scorpion.

6.title: True Colors
6.plot: Hetty Lange helps the scorpion gang solve a high end art fraud.

7.title: Father's Day
7.plot: The team is trying to capture escaped convicts from prison.

8.title: Risky Business
8.plot: Scorpion asks a music artist for help after he creates an algorithm that can produce popular songs and may find the killer of a music blogger; Drew asks Walter to help find a way to make a connection with his son.

9.title: Rogue Element
9.plot: Team Scorpion must help protect Cabe's ex-wife after she uncovers evidence that suggests foul play in the death of a prominent congressman.

10.title: Talismans
10.plot: The team must recover stealth technology from a military plane that was shot down in Bosnia. Walter's sister visits with Sylvester at the garage.

11.title: Revenge
11.plot: Sylvester is seriously injured when he accidentally triggers an explosive device during an investigations and Team Scorpion search for who is responsible.

12.title: Dominoes
12.plot: A 10-year-old boy is trapped in a rockslide/sinkhole near the beach. The team must find a way to rescue him before the rising tide fills it up with water.

13.title: Kill Screen
13.plot: The team tries to help Ralph when he is taken by the FBI for questioning after his web game play unintentionally reveals a CIA safe house's location.

14.title: Charades
14.plot: Team Scorpion is tasked with uncovering a mole inside the CIA whose judgment is clouded by matters of the heart and is being coerced into stealing deadly chemicals. Also, in preparation for the case, Paige gives Walter a flirting lesson.

15.title: Forget Me Nots
15.plot: The team works with an injured former Secret Service agent, attempting to restore his memories to avoid a nuclear launch from a secret US silo.

16.title: Love Boat
16.plot: Team Scorpion goes undercover on a cruise ship to locate and disable deadly stolen rockets. Meanwhile, as Valentine's Day approaches, Toby and Happy help Ralph, who is in the throes of his first crush.

17.title: Going South
17.plot: A tech billionaire hires the team to rescue his kidnapped daughter. Meanwhile, feelings are hurt when Walter gives an interview and fails to acknowledge the other members of the team.

18.title: Once Bitten, Twice Die
18.plot: When a conflict in Eastern Europe threatens to escalate, Team Scorpion is called on to help facilitate secret peace talks to prevent World War III.

19.title: Young Hearts Spark Fire
19.plot: While on a mission to save lost hikers, Team Scorpion's helicopter crashes, igniting a massive wildfire that quickly closes in on them. Also, Sylvester must help their injured pilot who is unable to make it to safer ground.

20.title: Crossroads
20.plot: To protect a key witness who is en route to testifying against a deadly drug cartel, Team Scorpion takes her on the run, with the cartel hot on their heels.

21.title: Cliffhanger
21.plot: Walter learns Cabe's long-hidden secret regarding the Baghdad mission and it threatens to tear Team Scorpion apart. Meanwhile, Ralph puts his life in danger to help the team.

22.title: Postcards from the Edge
22.plot: Team Scorpion is torn apart and uncertain about their future as a unit, but they are forced to come together to save Walter's life when his car teeters on the side of a cliff.

1.title: Satellite of Love
1.plot: The new Director of Homeland Security reunites the team when a nuclear powered Russian satellite is knocked out of orbit and must be diverted before it detonates over Southern California.

2.title: Cuba Libre
2.plot: Team Scorpion heads to Cuba when a woman from Cabe's past pleads for him to help catch a Serbian war criminal.

3.title: Fish Filet
3.plot: In order to save the lives of three judges, Sylvester goes undercover in a federal prison. Team Scorpion must break him out when his life is threatened.

4.title: Robots
4.plot: The Navy enlists three members of Scorpion on a classified mission in a top-secret submarine 300-feet below the surface. When the crew discover Walter, Happy, and Cabe using comms to communicate with the rest of their team back in the garage, they confiscate and destroy them. But an explosion sends the sub, and everyone on board, to the bottom of the ocean floor with limited oxygen and without any way to get help or notify anyone where they are.

5.title: Super Fun Guys
5.plot: The team goes undercover on the set of a superhero movie in Kazakhstan to dismantle a nuclear missile being sold by terrorists.

6.title: Tech, Drugs, and Rock 'n Roll
6.plot: Walter's attempt to "normalize" goes horribly wrong when a nefarious virus is uploaded to his computer, turning Scorpion's new "smart" building project into a burning death trap with people locked inside.

7.title: Crazy Train
7.plot: The team tries to stop a runaway train that Paige and Ralph are on.

8.title: Area 51
8.plot: Megan's condition get's most worse. Walter starts to get frustrated about not being able to help her and in Walter's crazy quest for investors the CIA appears in the garage with the promise of a big payday.

9.title: US vs. UN vs. UK
9.plot: Team Scorpion is blackmailed to break into the United Nations to assist in the assassination of a menacing arms dealer. Also, Sylvester makes a bold move to protect Megan's wishes.

10.title: Arrivals and Departures
10.plot: As Megan's condition worsens, the team gathers at the hospital. As they arrive, they find a pathogen has infected the hospital threatening all of their lives.

11.title: The Old College Try
11.plot: The Scorpion team goes under cover at a college to discover who is holding the federal reserve for ransom. Walter tries to help Ray, while Paige is trying to get Walter to express grief about Megan.

12.title: Dam Breakthrough
12.plot: Its Christmas Eve and Team Scorpion must prevent a catastrophe when torrential rains create a large crack in a dam. The fight to save an entire town from the threat of it wiping out an entire town in its wake.

13.title: White Out
13.plot: In order to save a United States Special Forces unit from certain death, the Scorpion Team must get through the very low temperatures of Antarctica to connect to a satellite in order to save the soldiers. Toby risks his life to save Happy.

14.title: Sun of a Gun
14.plot: Sylvester comes face to face with his estranged father, a retired general, who asks Team Scorpion for help when he believes that a dictator in Africa has uncovered a deadly World War II-era weapon of mass destruction and intends to use it.

15.title: Da Bomb
15.plot: Team Scorpion is tasked with helping NASA's top secret rocket launch, but they must sabotage their own mission when Walter's date from the previous night has a bomb strapped to her chest.

16.title: Fractured
16.plot: When a powerful earthquake hits LA, Team Scorpion must prevent a pinched gas line from causing a massive explosion.

17.title: Adaptation
17.plot: While Team Scorpion works to stop an influx of drugs being smuggled into the country via drones, Walter gives Happy and Toby an ultimatum on their new relationship. Penn Jillette guest stars.

18.title: The Fast & the Nerdiest
18.plot: After Sylvester scores big on THE PRICE IS RIGHT, Team Scorpion must infiltrate a high-end car smuggling operation about to ship bioweapons to South America

19.title: Ticker
19.plot: When Los Angeles' blood supply is hacked and deemed unusable because of fear it's been tainted, Team Scorpion must find the culprit in order to save a young girl in desperate need of a heart transplant.

20.title: Djibouti Call
20.plot: Scorpion is sent on a secret mission to Djibouti, Africa. Cabe is captured. The Team must save him. While Walter has suspicions about the purpose of the mission and concerns over Paige's interest in new Homeland protégé, Tim Armstrong.

21.title: Twist and Shout
21.plot: Team Scorpion's mission to recover the remains of fallen Marines in Vietnam is threatened along with their lives when a deadly tornado heads directly towards them.

22.title: Hard Knox
22.plot: Team Scorpion is hired by the Department of Defense to break into Fort Knox and "steal" a precious artifact in order to test their security, but they must break in a second time when they find something dangerous hidden inside the object.

23.title: Chernobyl Intentions
23.plot: In Chernobyl, Sylvester and Paige become trapped inside a decaying nuclear reactor that the team is trying to repair before a tragic meltdown.

24.title: Toby or Not Toby
24.plot: The team races against time to stop an unstable ex-member of Scorpion, Mark Collins who kidnaps and threatens to kill Toby if his demands are not met.

1.title: Civil War
1.plot: Team Scorpion must put aside their personal issues when hackers take control of U.S. military aircraft and warships.

2.title: More Civil War
2.plot: Cabe, Tim and Sly are in Blugaria trying to find a group of hackers, while Paige finds out some upsetting news.

3.title: It Isn't the Fall That Kills You
3.plot: Walter is accidentally launched into space and the team races to bring him home before his oxygen runs out.

4.title: Little Boy Lost
4.plot: Team Scorpion must find a boy from Ralph's class who goes missing on a field trip after he accidentally has a run-in with a deadly criminal; Toby gets closer to finding out the identity of Happy's husband.

5.title: Plight at the Museum
5.plot: Team Scorpion's simple job at the Los Angeles Natural History Musuem turns deadly when they discover thieves robbing a rare exhibit, needed to enrich a nuclear bomb.

6.title: Bat Poop Crazy
6.plot: Team Scorpion explores a deep cave system in an effort to prevent a bat population from harming the North American ecosystem; the team dons Halloween costumes for Walter's impending immigration inspection.

7.title: We're Gonna Need a Bigger Vote
7.plot: On election day, someone tries to create turmoil in the U.S. presidential election, and Team Scorpion is called to investigate.

8.title: Sly and the Family Stone
8.plot: The one-year memorial of Megan, lead the team to a explosion. Which could wipe out the entire country.

9.title: Mother Load
9.plot: Paige's estranged mother calls on Team Scorpion when she accidentally uncovers a forgotten nuclear reactor on the verge of exploding.

10.title: This Is the Pits
10.plot: Team Scorpion must rescue a woman trapped in the La Brea Tar Pits before she runs out of oxygen.

11.title: Wreck the Halls
11.plot: Team Scorpion's mountain getaway on Christmas Eve turns deadly when they cross paths with gun-runners and Ralph is kidnapped.

12.title: Ice Ca-Cabes
12.plot: The team is forced to freeze Cabe's body when he's hurt by exploding shrapnel during a mission in the desert.

13.title: Faux Money Maux Problems
13.plot: When Team Scorpion is duped into producing counterfeit money for a foreign entity intent on ruining the U.S. economy, Paige must rely on her mother Veronica's skills as a grifter to save them.

14.title: The Hole Truth
14.plot: Team Scorpion must save a man teetering on the edge of a massive sink hole that threatens to destroy the Los Angeles water supply forever.

15.title: Sharknerdo
15.plot: Walter and Paige are surrounded by sharks when their boat explodes in the middle of the Pacific Ocean during a mission to find sunken treasure.

16.title: Keep It in Check, Mate
16.plot: Walter and Sylvester enter an international chess competition under cover on foreign soil for Team Scorpion in order to extricate a U.S. spy before her identity is exposed.

17.title: Dirty Seeds, Done Dirt Cheap
17.plot: When a simple mission to protect a vital seed bank goes awry, Team Scorpion must save Happy, Sylvester and Cabe, who begin suffering from life-threatening, fear-based hallucinations.

18.title: Don't Burst My Bubble
18.plot: Team Scorpion must save a young girl with no immune system who is also a new friend with of Happy's after a storm. Paige and Cabe has to cut people out of their lives.

19.title: Monkey See, Monkey Poo
19.plot: To stop a dangerous virus from spreading, Team Scorpion must locate a rare endangered monkey in the Amazon that has the antibody for the cure. Also, Toby and Happy see a counselor.

20.title: Broken Wind
20.plot: While on a mission to repair a turbine at a wind farm, Team Scorpion must race to save Paige and Happy before the cable holding the gondola they are in snaps and sends them plummeting to the ground.

21.title: Rock Block
21.plot: Team Scorpion retrieves an asteroid with DNA strands that could lead to deadly consequences.

22.title: Strife on Mars
22.plot: Team Scorpion gets trapped inside a failing and dangerous biodome designed for Mars while trying to extract a pair of scientists inside.

23.title: Something Burrowed, Something Blew
23.plot: The team has to help Happy and Toby to get to the altar for the wedding after a simple job went haywire.

24.title: Maroon 8
24.plot: The team's plane crash lands on a remote desert island while en route to Toby and Happy's honeymoon, leaving them all with little hope for rescue.

25.title: Scorp Family Robinson
25.plot: Tensions run high for members of Team Scorpion when they must overcome personal conflicts to be rescued from the desert island they crashlanded on three weeks earlier.

locations: MBS Media Campus - 1600 Rosecrans Avenue, Manhattan Beach, California, USA::(studio)
Los Angeles Center Studios - 450 S. Bixel Street, Downtown, Los Angeles, California, USA
imdb.plot outline: Based on the real life of Walter O'Brien, a genius with an IQ of 197. Walter is asked by Homeland Security to put together a special group of gifted individuals to troubleshoot the most difficult problems that the US & the world may encounter.
imdb.title: Scorpion
plot: An eccentric genius forms an international network of super-geniuses to act as the last line of defense against the complicated threats of the modern world.::David Rush

Based on the real life of Walter O'Brien, a genius with an IQ of 197. Walter is asked by Homeland Security to put together a special group of gifted individuals to troubleshoot the most difficult problems that the US & the world may encounter.::Blair

_Scorpion_ (qv) is based on the life of Walter O'Brien, a genius with an IQ of 197. Walter heads up a group of geniuses who are asked to work with Homeland Security Agent Cabe Gallo. Their talents and gifts help them in all kinds of situations, but they have trouble getting along with each other.
